message.body: I think the cat is a boy so his name is Abu
Haha okay. I like that
I meant to tell you. Eden said it's a boy
Female cats can't have orange in them.
She can tell from looking at him??
Oh yea I heard that.
But I lifted his tail this morning. I can tell based on the shape abd location of the genitals.
I was upset bec I wanted him to be a girl so I could name her cinnamon
Haha well that's always good too
You probably want to get him fixed. Male cats spray when they're not
Yea im going to when he is old enough... oh, I gave him a bath yesterday. Surprisingly he was really good about. Let me hold him under the water and everything
That's good. I want to see him. What time Saturday morning?
Also Eden will come and help. She wants to see him too
Ok I was going to say hold off and seeing him. Only bec he had fleas. And I gave him a fkea bath yesterday and put a flea collar on him but just in case idw you both taking fleas to edens house.
He has a vet appt next wed
Okay. Well I'll be there any way
Ahaha ok cool... ill be up around 8 so anytime after that
Okay
I was playing with Abu and we didn't see any fleas so I think the flea bath worked... and he met Shadow tonight. It was actually quite a boring meet, lol
Okay that's good. And I think it's scary to have him around Shadow. I don't trust shadow. He gets rough.
Yea I know. Steph was holding him while I helf abu but shadow was actually calm instead of pulling away from Stroh
Steph*
Okay.
